name: Greek Sunfire
description:
So what's a guy to do when his home and temples are getting invaded? Ask Archimedes, who was minding his own business when out of nowhere a fleet of ships attacked! But lo! Archimedes had no weapons, no army, not even a vicious gyro to his name. The only defense he had was…. SCIENCE! Use the power of light and mirrors to focus a beam of happy sunshine intense enough to burn those miserable cretins to ash. SCIENCE! Also, watch out. Boats aren't the only dangers of the deep…

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 36.

Team Members: John Thrasher, Micha Faw, Jesse Slade, with additional ideas and testing from Jodi Slade & Jen Thrasher
